title: (1 Month FREE) Cozy Eastside Pad!
posting_body: This apartment is home to an impressive amount of onsite amenities including a large 24-hour gym, Rooftop Deck and Kitchen with a large resort-style pool for swimming, lounging, grilling, and chilling.
You will have everything you need to unwind in the summer months!

This East Austin complex in the most exciting and vibrate part of Austin, it's walking distance to some of the best restaurants, coffee shops, and bars that this city has to offer and it's only a short hop to downtown!
Next-generation community with amenities for todays work-from-home lifestyle.
Co-working space with conference rooms, private offices, and open seating.
Spacious two-story fitness club overlooking the pool.
With a Pet Play Area and a Pet Cleaning Station, you can take your furry friend out to play without leaving your home!
Call/text me to check it out today!

++ As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
